Edit menu commands
 

The Edit submenu gives access to the following commands:
 
Undo  Undoes the latest editing operation, whenever possible.
Cut Deletes data from the document and moves it to the clipboard.
Copy Copies data from the document to the clipboard.
Paste Pastes data from the clipboard into the document.
Paste special... Pastes OLE data from the clipboard (OLE technology).
Select All Select all the text in the current text window.
Find... Opens the Find dialog box, to look for a specified string into the current window.
Find Next Finds next occurrence (as stated in the Find dialog box). It works only if the Find dialog box has been closed.
Replace Opens the Replace dialog box, to look for a specified string into the current window and replace it.
Insert New Object Opens the Insert Object dialog window. 
Links Opens the Links Dialog Box (available only if you have links into your current file).
Object Properties Displays the object properties, that depend on your computer and on the object itself.
Object <Name> It comes directly from your computer system.
